channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
[b]omfg, posted in tutorials by accident, mods ignore that please, misclick![/b]
hey, i'm djspankey, currently using allstarscape as a source, if you know of a better one that is a 317, please post it. i need 2 quetions helped with please.
first thing is the home location:
can you help me with changing the home location aswell as the teleports to it.
second is the max levels / cb levels:
can you help me change these, thanks
working answers will get rep=D
[edit]can't rep sorry, but when i get 15 rep i will![/edit]

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“djspanke, post:3, topic:269082”]this just changes the starter location doesn’t it? i need so if you do ::home you would go to somewhere else

so people, still need 1 and 2 answered[/quote]

that is because, you need to change your home command coords to the coords of your new home. just search “home”, it should have some coords in the command, change the coords to your home coords.

the other is in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

changing home location is easy.

Get the coords where you start.
Go to player.java and search for : the absX of your start location. Change it to the new absX cood of your new start location.
Same with absY

Read full topic
